import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPenToSquare } from '@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons' import { faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' //TODO: Date Updated, confirm deletion export const Issue = ({issue, toggleComplete, editIssue, deleteIssue}) => { return (

toggleComplete(issue.id)} >{issue.issue}


{issue.line}

{issue.component}


{issue.error}

{issue.severity}

{issue.priority}

{issue.statusKey}

{issue.assignee}

editIssue(issue.id)} /> deleteIssue(issue.id)} />
) }
